com.facebook.buck.android

Class ApkGenrule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.rules.AbstractBuildRule
      • com.facebook.buck.shell.Genrule
        • com.facebook.buck.android.ApkGenrule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasBuildTarget, HasOutputName, BuildRule, InstallableApk, SupportsInputBasedRuleKey, Comparable<BuildRule>

    public class ApkGenrule
extends Genrule
implements InstallableApk
    A specialization of a genrule that specifically allows the modification of apks. This is useful for processes that modify an APK, such as zipaligning it or signing it.

    The generated APK will be at rule_name.apk. 

     apk_genrule(
   name = 'fb4a_signed',
   apk = ':fbandroid_release'
   deps = [
     '//java/com/facebook/sign:fbsign_jar',
   ],
   cmd = '${//java/com/facebook/sign:fbsign_jar} --input $APK --output $OUT'
 )
